TopicTitle: Planet-filled system! (Suggest any body you want!) Currently at 18

Articles.Content:
This is ambient stars revived, but with only one binary pair of stars. They have 1.108M and 1.445L which puts them as G0V. Maybe I will tweak one to be a bit larger and so on for realism, but they share a barycrnter and orbit each other every day.

This configuration puts a habitable zone at 1.7AU (64GM in JNSQ scale), and orbiting every 365 days. All the other planets from LSR have been repositioned into the system to give a starting kick off of 18 bodies. Revan will not be the homeworld, it’s too far out. Instead… well, the community will have to come up with a body.

To come up with a body:

State the name of the body. If it has one. If not, it will be put up for naming. You can also name some of my LSR bodies as well.

State the radius and gravity of the body. It’s in JNSQ scale, where Kerbin for reference has 1600km and 1G. Make it realistic and i’ll tweak if necessary. Larger bodies get denser and bodies further away that are icy are less dense, and as a rule of thumb a double in radius= a double in gravity or slightly more.

If there is an atmosphere, say so and specify what it’s composed mainly of. I will calculate stuff like the atmosphere height myself.

Finally, state the orbital parameters (semi major axis and parent body), as well as a brief description of the body like it’s color and overall terrain, as well as some specifications that may be needed like a high inclination, rings or eccentricity.

 

If your planet is in the way of another, it may be sent into a trojan orbit or relocated.

 

Please hold back on habitable planets and make them interesting rather than what Vera (a clitche habitable planet is like). (In LSR, Revan is somewhat cold and heavy (and also the homeworld), Perbi has more gravity than Eve and double the radius and Heyu doesn’t have oxygen which technically doesn’t even make it habitable.

 

please.suggest.moons

 

if you would like to name a body, please specificy which one it is using provisional code or name.

 

If the name is in use, you will be quoted.

Provisional names work the same way as LSR.

 

should this be forum games?

i will *try* to make the body myself if the suggestions go slowly, but i’m also looking to recruit developers. Just respond to me in the reply section.
